isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 530 Engine Diagnostic Manual for 4000 Series Trucks (2001) - DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS - MASTER DIAGNOSTICS (MD 32) - GRAPHIC WINDOW & ADDING PARAMETER IDENTIFIERS (PID)

svcsubproc.title: Data in Graphical Format
svcsubproc.para: To monitor the engine parameter data in graphical format you must first create a graphical window. This is done similar to the creation of a text view window. Select File and then New on the menu bar. Then open the Select a File Type dialog box.
Select Parameter Graphical View (.pgv) as the desired type to open and click OK.
A generic graphical display window will appear. It will not have any parameters in it . It will display the time axis and the range axis .
The procedure to add or delete a single or series of parameters is the same as the procedure found in the previous section entitled Data in Text Format beginning with Step 5 .
The graphical window will now display the selected parameters using their acronyms. Master Diagnostics preselects different colors for each parameter in the order they are added to the window .
Use a text view window to find the full description for these parameters .
